_sText: Map Name: fy_dev_hexakilla Players: 8-12 Buy zone: Yes, at highest point in map. Flow: Very good, several ways to choke points flanking maneuvers execute quickly and efficiently. slight advantage to CT, as the path to T spawn is more easily maneuvered. In return the road from T to CT spawn is more covered and defensive. Eye Candy: Nil, i did raise the light map scale to give it some extra. There are lit textures instead of light entities. the hex pits add extra challenge and there are a few jump obstacles that help the game play for sure. This map is full of 'Z' axis game play, plenty of routes, and it damn near feels flow-a-matic. Greyfrogs Hexagon Series
